## What does this PR do?

Brief description of the changes.

## Type of change

- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Breaking change
- [ ] Documentation
- [ ] Refactoring

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] Types check (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] No new vulnerabilities (`npm audit`)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated (if user-facing)
- [ ] No `any` types (except at the OpenClaw API boundary)
- [ ] Generated config uses `JSON5.stringify()`, not string interpolation
- [ ] User data in Telegram messages is HTML-escaped
- [ ] File writes use atomic write-and-rename

Describe any breaking changes and migration steps, or "None".

What you did to verify the changes work.
